Interrupts.Name: Golden Armor
Interrupts.Tags: requires at least one valuables token
Interrupts.Trigger: Self or an adjacent ally is targeted by ability.
Interrupts.Effects: Grant resistance and unstoppable against the triggering ability, then if this character has at least one valuables token, discard a valuables token, destroying it.

Actions.Name: The Block
Actions.Description: The [name] chooses a foe in range. At the end of that foe's next turn, the [name] rushes up to 4 spaces towards them. If the [name] ends this movement adjacent to the chosen foe, they must save or take 2[D]+[fray], or [D]+[fray] on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Execute
Actions.Description: A foe in range 2 at 25% HP or lower must save. On a failed save, they are defeated, ignoring all other effects. On a successful save, they sacrifice down to 1 hp.
